channel.title: Comments on: Judge John Hodgman
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Beard | First Time Flowing

item.description: [...] realize that though John Hodgman ruled in my favor and Nick may consider this some kind of victory, I have made inroads toward bearddom. That is, I [...]

item.title: By: anna
item.dc:creator: anna
item.description:
your hotly-contested website plug worked...i just had to see exhibits a and b.
as a lady, i say you're totally cute without the beard.
item.content:encoded:
your hotly-contested website plug worked…i just had to see exhibits a and b.

as a lady, i say you’re totally cute without the beard.
